results.title: Wine Barrel Head Sign "Wine Bar" Made from retired Stags Leap California wine barrels - 100% Recycled + Free US Shipping!!
results.description:
FREE SHIPPING (US ONLY)!

Handcrafted from locally sourced Napa wine barrels in the heart of California wine country, our exquisite art collection will showcase your home or business with a rustic elegance unique to California wine culture. Available in a wide variety of designs and customizable options, our extensive collection is sure to be the most functional piece of art you own!

The  WINE BAR  is a wine sign crafted from 100% recycled Napa valley wine barrels that have been carefully taken apart and fashioned into a beautiful handmade sign. It would be perfect to hang over your wine bar or in a wine cellar to add the authentic feel of California's Napa Valley to any home. They are irresistible and a fun delight to hang inside or outside.

INCLUDES: Barrel head art piece, all mounting hardware plus extra goodies from the shop, my treat!

DIMENSIONS: Approx. 22" diameter x 3" deep (projecting from wall).

MATERIAL: Retired California wine barrel rings, wine barrel head.

SHIPPING: We ship internationally! Additional shipping charges are required for orders to Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico and all international destinations. Send us a message with your address for an estimate. Shipping discounts are available for multiple purchases.

SEE ALSO: Check out my shop to see matching pieces, decor and more. 

CUSTOM DESIGN: Don’t see quite what you’re looking for? We can adapt our designs or create new custom work based on your ideas. Let me know! I love a fun project!

CONNECT: Want to see what’s new and exciting in our shop? Follow us on Facebook or Instagram! I post all the new designs, prototypes, quirky odd projects and more. If you’ve placed an order, you might even see it being built!

Enjoy!

It’s pretty amazing what happens in our shop. Thanks for visiting!

Michael

All our products are exquisitely handcrafted, using 100% recycled materials. They are singular creations that are not factory-made or mass produced. Our highly skilled artisans do their best to ensure that each item resembles the photos as closely as possible, however there may be very slight variations or natural imperfections in the materials which is what make each piece of a handmade product charming and unique. The product you receive may not be the one pictured. Its probably more awesome!

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Themed Hand-Painted Natural Wood Coasters

All coasters come in a set of 4. 

Ships from Long Island, New York.

results.title: Live Love Laugh HEART .925 Sterling Silver Charm Pendant Valentine Love Words Inspirational Sayings Small New hr08
results.description:
.925 Sterling Silver LIVE LAUGH LOVE HEART Charm

NEW

Measures approx 12 mm by 12 mm not including the jump ring. (1/2")

Average weight 1.6 grams.

All our charms come with a strong Sterling jump ring making it easy if you plan to attach it to a bracelet.

If you are looking at this charm for a Pandora Style bracelet you will need to purchase a Converter Bead which we can attach to the charm for you. You can find options in our shop in the Converter Bead Section.

All additional items ship for free - you only pay ONCE to ship as many items as you choose so please check out our shop!

We carry over a thousand designs in Sterling Silver charms allowing you to create your own unique bracelet or necklace. If you are looking for something and don't find it here in our store please send us a message and we can see if we have it in our stock.

results.title: GRADUATION CAP CUSTOM Name Year Charm Photo Bead Charm,  Custom Made, Sterling Silver .925 Fits Pandora Style Bracelet & Chamilia (2 sides)
results.description:
WELCOME TO MY ESTY SHOP:  When purchasing please provide the name and the year via Etsy message.  Thank you.


**PLEASE CAREFULLY READ DESCRIPTION:  THIS BEAD CHARM IS 9MM SQUARE.  THE IMAGE FITS INSIDE THE BEAD SO IT IS RELATIVELY SMALL.  HOWEVER, THIS CHARM BEAD IS DESIGNED TO FIT THE PANDORA OR CHAMILIA TYPE BRACELET.  I CAREFULLY PROVIDE SAMPLES TO SHOW HOW THE CHARM BEAD LOOKS ON A PANDORA TYPE BRACELET.  IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS BEFORE YOU PURCHASE, I AM VERY HAPPY TO ANSWER THEM. 

CHARM BEAD:  One Lovely Shiny Sterling Silver .925 9mm Photo Bead - Fits Pandora style and Chamilia style bracelets and necklaces.

PLEASE NOTE THAT IF YOU CHOOSE A HANGING BEAD, I'LL NEED TO KNOW WITH PAYMENT AS IT REQUIRES THE IMAGE TO BE PLACED FOR A VERTICLE BEAD.

This bead features subject image inset on both sides of the Photo Bead and is covered with a protective cold enamel. Image is on both sides with alternate sides of pretty embossed flowers.  Please note that other sellers offer beads with only one photo side.  My price includes artwork on both images. My samples may not be perfectly clear due to downsizing; however, the originals are crystal clear.

PLEASE NOTE: To provide the best photo beads with the best clarity, I make all of my beads "new".  The process:  The downsized images are cut to the size of the 9mm bead and glued on both sides of the photo charm bead, next I place enamel on one side and wait for it to dry (generally 24 hours. Sometimes longer) so it takes at least two days for both sides to dry.  My turnaround is normally between 5-7 workdays.  

To allow for proper enamel drying time, after receipt of payment, item will be shipped within "FIVE TO SEVEN” days 

All orders come with an organza gift bag!

IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE MESSAGE ME BEFORE PURCHASING.  CUSTOMER SATISFACTION IS MY GOAL.  THANK YOU :)

SHIPPING: Contiguous United States only!

Thank you for browsing my shop!

results.title: Kitchen towels with knitted tops - Inspirational text
results.description:
These kitchen towels are a variation on an old favourite. The traditional version was crocheted and had a button sewn into it. Unfortunately, the buttons were often too small and would easily undo when brushed against. They also fell off or caught things in the wash. These towels have a larger knitted button that does not come undone because of its size, does not fall off because it is part of the towel, and does not catch things in the wash.

These towels are the regular thickness.  If you would like a thicker towel, check my other ads.  Thicker towels are listed as "thicker" or "double".

Some of these towels come with different coloured tops. If you require a specific colour for the top of your towel, please contact me before ordering.

results.title: Succulent Wreath, Plant Wreath, Purple Wreath, Burlap Wreath, All Occasion Wreath, Blue Wreath, Gifts for Mom, Gifts for Women, Mother’s Day

results.title: INSTANT DOWNLOAD - Live, Laugh, Love - Valentine's Day - Crochet Graph - Crochet Pattern - Graphgan - Afghan - Crochet Blanket
results.description:
Thank you for your interest in a graph by 2LittleCraigsCrochet! This listing is an instant download and will be available as soon as your order is processed!

You will receive 3 PDF files containing:
-Graph (190x260) printed over 9 pages for easy reading with suggested yarn colors
-Color coded row by row instructions for SINGLE CROCHET
-Written out row by row instructions (see last picture of listing for examples)

Approximate finished size will be 50" x 65".

Due to the digital nature of the product, I cannot offer refunds. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.

Please do not share, reproduce or resell any part of this pattern. If you intend to sell items made from this pattern, I'd appreciate it if you'd link back to my shop!

results.title: Laugh as much as you breathe,Love as long as you live
results.description:
White with black font 

Hand painted on spruce/ pine in chalk paint then distressed by hand. All signs are sealed with 2 layers of wax. No two signs are alike as no two boards are alike. our signs come from a smoke free/pet free home. If you would like a custom color please feel free to send a message. 
The sign shown is a sample of the one you will receive. 
****I use both new and reclaimed wood so the wood can include and is not limited to having noticeable knots, wood grain, cracks, holes, chips and natural defects. These all add to the uniqueness of your sign and make it one of a kind.***
This sign comes with a sawtooth hook on the back for easy wall hanging.

results.title: Pizza Tacos Burgers Wall Decal | Kitchen Wall Vinyl Decal | Live Love Laugh Spoof - Chef - Pizzeria - Large 50" Wall Decor
results.description:
Pizza Tacos Burgers Wall Decal

Wall decal measures approximately 50" (width) x 8.7"(height) when applied as shown. Depending upon design, decals may come in individual pieces or as one full sheet. We can make this in other sizes for you, so please contact us if you need a different size!

Our wall decals are cut from professional grade, matte calendered vinyl that is made specifically for interior walls. Wall vinyl is ideal for home decor and other temporary projects. Our wall vinyl is even rated for up to 6 years outdoors, however, we recommend that if you will be placing this outside, to please contact us first and we will be glad to make it from actual outdoor vinyl.

All of our designs are original and drawn in-house by two professional Graphic Designers. Original illustrations are high quality vectors that cut with very clean lines and edges, therefore, you will always receive first quality products from us. Please be aware that any other shops who may ever have our designs for sale have plagiarized our work which will result in low quality, sub-par products being sold to you. We take pride in our business and profession so please always contact us if you have a custom request or need a different size!

Decals are precision cut and do not have any logos, trademarks or background. Clear transfer tape is already applied to the decal for easy installation! Step-by-step application instructions are included. We cannot be held responsible for any installation errors or any incompatibility issues.  The image is for display/example purposes only and may not reflect the actual size of the item. Please refer to size measurements for specifications. 

Please see our FAQ regarding wall vinyl prior to purchase: 
https://www.etsy.com/shop/LaserGraphix#about

results.title: Live. Laugh. Pizza. - Dish Towel
results.description:
Product Pictured: “Live Laugh Pizza”
100% Cotton 
28” x 29” – White Cotton Towel with Black Vinyl Design
Prewashed, Preshrunk & Lint Free

This fun (& funny) lightweight dish towel is the perfect touch of humor for your kitchen! It is durable, absorbent and can even make you smile while doing the dishes.
Looking to spruce up your kitchen? Need a fun gift idea? Housewarming present? Birthdays, holidays, anniversaries, bridal showers, employee of the month, “thank you for watching my cat” gift etc. – This towel is perfect! Or hey, maybe a “you’re doing great” gift for yourself! You don’t really need a reason, you deserve it! 

Should you have a custom saying you do not see listed and were really hoping for, shoot us a quick message or email and we will see what we can do! We do not have any other color options than what is listed but hope to soon!

Our shipping promise: FREE. ‘Cause who doesn’t like free shipping… Just give us 1-2 business days for design time and then your hand made to order piece will be on its way to you!
We make every item to order and refuse to send out a product below our standards. 

If you have any questions about our company, design process or a customized product please do not hesitate to ask… we’re friendly! 😊 

So excited to design for/with you!
Cheers!! 
xo

results.title: Family Vinyl Wall Decal-Personalized Family Name We Live Laugh Play Love-
results.description:
Personalized Family Name
we live we laugh we play we love



Please send NAME during checkout.

Vinyl Wall Decal

- Interior grade vinyl
- Matte finish for hand painted look
- Easy to install
- Removable, but cannot be reapplied
- See last picture for color chart



All of our wall decals are custom made to order. 

We use high quality Matte vinyl.

They are removable but not reusable. 


 
**PICTURE MAY NOT BE TO SIZE. 

PLEASE SEE MEASUREMENTS FOR SIZE.
 



The background will be whatever color your surface is.
 •
We can custom size most designs to your specifications. Please contact us for an estimate. 

•
We can also create custom word art (for example - favorite phrases, names, Bible verses, etc.) Contact us for more information. 


JOIN US ON FACEBOOK
 
L & B Graphics
 •
Enjoy your new vinyl decals! 



They can be placed on any flat smooth surface – walls, doors, mirrors, windows, cars, etc. They are great for decorating, freshening up a space, giving as gifts, personalizing your space…the list goes on. They are removable but not reusable.
 
***Not recommended for Textured Surfaces!

They are simple to apply and ready to install when you receive them. The entire decal is placed on a sheet of transfer paper. Just remove the backing paper, place your decal where you want it, rub it on, remove the transfer paper and PRESTO – you've just personalized your space! You can have the item as shown, or pick your own color. Application instructions are sent with every order. 



**Note to all my international customers: I will have your item shipped within 2 business days after purchase, but I have no control over how long customs takes to process your package in your country. It could take between 2 - 6 weeks.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Zipper Charm
results.description:
Stainless Steel Zipper Charm.

Stainless Steel High Shine charm dangles from a Steel Metal spring hook. Looks great hanging from any zipper. 

This can also be made into a Pet Charm. Just indicate this in the notes section upon purchase.

Stainless Steel charm is LASER engraved not etched. The charm is made from high-quality Stainless Steel; hand polished on both sides. Stainless Steel is hypoallergenic with a HIGH MIRROR SHINE and won't tarnish. The lettering will not fade and there are no aerosol paints or chemicals in the lasering process.

I can custom design anything you want. Contact me to create something unique for you or that special person in your life.

*All pieces come in a Beautiful Gift Box and packaged for a safe arrival ready to give as a gift or to store.

Sending a gift? I would be pleased to send a personalized handmade note card and no extra charge for you.
